work.name: Radio-Canada
work.summary: Development of new features and bug fixing on many different projects in C# .NET and Angular-CLI(2+). Development of software prototypes for different broadcasts. Development of RESTful API.
highlights: Development of new features and bug fixing on many different projects in C# .NET and Angular-CLI(2+)
Development of software prototypes for different broadcasts

work.name: Bonlook
work.summary: Website maintenance PHP Laravel. Top to bottom automatic deployment system in AWS with Terraform and Node.js. REST API development in Python. Automation of the staging deployment process with terraform.
highlights: Top to bottom automatic deployment system in AWS with Terraform and Node.js
Automation of the staging deployment process with terraform

work.name: Radio-Canada (CBC)

work.name: EXO
work.summary: Development of new features and bug fixing on client facing website in C# .NET and ASP MVC .NET. Direct internal client communication. Writing of processes for the transition from AMT to EXO. QA of billing system updates before deployment.
highlights: Development of new features and bug fixing on client facing website in C# .NET and ASP MVC .NET
Writing of processes for the transition from AMT to EXO
QA of billing system updates before deployment

projects.name: doormonster.tv
highlights: Developing a full subscription platform with Java Spring boot and Angular 2+
Modernize infrastructure by moving it to the cloud in AWS and Digital Ocean

projects.name: Twitch Integrator
highlights: Developing a plugin that facilitates the integration of twitch chat interactions through easy to use event nodes made in C++
